Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 駅員
Entry.EnglishText: Station Attendant

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 商店
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>バルカ鉄道は、無料で ご利用いただけます。 ご乗車になりますか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>The Balka Railway is free of charge. Would you like to take a ride?

Entry.JapaneseText: 南門広場
Entry.EnglishText: South Gate

Entry.JapaneseText: 西門前
Entry.EnglishText: West Gate

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城前
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: 商店前
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄道に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Don't Ride

Entry.JapaneseText: そこにいる鉄道員のヤツ、 逃げ遅れた人がいるかもしれないって、 仕事を続けているんだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: See the brave railway worker there? He's staying at his post in case there are people who have yet to evacuate!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があっても、俺が あいつを守ってやる！ 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>の仲間としてな！
Entry.EnglishText: No matter what happens, I'll protect him as my fellow <Yellow>Man<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: この国を守る…… それが俺の使命だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Protecting this country... That is my mission!

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき、そこのお店に 誰か逃げ込んだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I just saw someone run into that store over there.

Entry.JapaneseText: 兵隊さんも入ってったけど、 しばらくしたら、何にもなく 出て行ったんだよね……
Entry.EnglishText: Some soldiers went in to look for him, but they left after they couldn't find him.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたのかなあ……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what's going on...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここからのお城の景色は ちょっとステキだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The view of the castle from here is kinda nice.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式は さすがに見えないけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: You won't be able to see the inauguration ceremony from here, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: お城の下に秘密トンネルが あるって聞いたけど…… 本当かなあ……？
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that there's a secret tunnel under the castle... I wonder if that's true?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマって、見るだけで ムカムカして来るよね！ 見た目もヘンだしさ！
Entry.EnglishText: I get sick just looking at Huma! They look so weird!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマなんかキライだ！ ボクはガジュマとしか 口きかないって決めたんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Huma! I only want to talk to Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: おじさん、どうして ヒューマなんかと一緒にいるの？ 変人だね！
Entry.EnglishText: Mister, why are you hanging out with Huma? You're a weirdo!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマは立派な種族で、 ヒューマはダメな種族だって みんな言ってるんだからな！
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone says that Gajuma are good and Huma are bad!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはガジュマの命令を 聞けばいいんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: We Gajuma should be ordering you around!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとヒューマの戦いが 始まるんだってね！ ボクだって戦うよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hear there's going to be a battle between the Huma and Gajuma! I'll fight, too!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはガジュマの敵だ！ おまえなんかに負けないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: You Huma are our enemies! We'll never be defeated by the likes of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマって見た目もヘンだし、 アタマも悪いんだね！
Entry.EnglishText: You Huma are both stupid and ugly!

Entry.JapaneseText: そこのお店で、薬を売ってる事も 知らないなんてさ……ハハハ……
Entry.EnglishText: I mean, how can you not know they sell medicine in that store over there? Hahaha!

Entry.JapaneseText: おじさん…… ボク、ヘンなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I feel strange, mister.

Entry.JapaneseText: この前までヒューマの事、 すっごくキライだったのに…… 今は全然、そんな事なくって……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd been hating Huma a lot lately, but now I don't feel that way...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ヒューマの友だちに ヒドイ事言っちゃったから、 もう会えないし……
Entry.EnglishText: But I said some awful things to my Huma friends, so I can't see them anymore...

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ガジュマとヒューマって 見た目が違うのに…… 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>なんだよね……？
Entry.EnglishText: So, even if Gajuma and Huma look different, they're both part of <Yellow>Mankind<White>, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、よくわからないよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really know if that's true...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何の音なんだろ…… 地震が来るって言う人も いるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: What this sound...? Some people are saying it's an earthquake...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、バルカの機関車は レールがギア式だから、 地震が来ても脱線しないんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The train here in Balka is on cogwheels, so it won't derail in the event of an earthquake.

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ラジルダの人たちは どうなっちゃったのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what happened to the people of Razilda?

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな逃げたよね？ 大丈夫だよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Did they escape in time? They're all okay, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ラジルダの人たちは どうなっちゃったのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what happened to the people of Razilda?

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな逃げたよね？ 大丈夫だよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Did they escape in time? They're all okay, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ガジュマとヒューマって 見た目が違うのに…… 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>なんだよね……？
Entry.EnglishText: So, even if Gajuma and Huma look different, they're both part of <Yellow>Mankind<White>, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、よくわからないよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really know if that's true...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『蒸気機関車ＴＫＧ－４式』 カレギアの最新技術を駆使して 作られた蒸気機関車。 お披露目の儀式に合わせて、 ＴＫＧ－３から、ＴＫＧ－４に バージョンアップされた。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Steam Locomotive, Type: TKG-4 - A steam locomotive built using the latest Callegean technology. It was upgraded from the TKG-3 to the TKG-4 in time for the inauguration ceremony.
